root: ^(Entering through the large arc gates of Victoria Park, the sky turns to shades of pinks and oranges)
^(You get a message from Ethan, you look around and see him waving in your direction)
^(Sticking his hand out, giving you a firm shake)

knot_ConvoStarter: ^Why don’t we walk around? There’s a great bench spot nearby.
^(Ethan nods, slowly, and walks beside you along the tarred pavement)
^(An silence falls between you two and you feel the need to start a conversation)

s: ^I see you have a nat for suits?

c-0: ^So, Ethan - what do you do? Are you working or studying–
c-1: ^(You awkwardly bring up as Ethan frowns looking down at his attire.)

knot_ConvoContinue1: ^I'm a lawyer, I actually came straight from my office firm.

s: ^Oh right, hence the suit. No tie?
^Cool, which sector of law are you in?

knot_NoTie: ^( A pause follows after. You see a bathroom nearby and think – )
^Tie’s are uncomfortable. It’s like a dog leash but around your neck.
knot_LawSector: ^( A pause follows after. You see a bathroom nearby and think – )
^It’s a lot to handle but I find myself learning something new every day.
knot_Tie: ^( You give him a soft smile)

s: ^I’ve never thought of it that way.
^Right, it’s like a dog collar but for men in suits.

knot_Learn: ^That’s exactly how I feel about business management;

s: ^There here’s so many ways to strategize and implement a new idea.
^It’s the reason I decided to complete a part-time honours program

knot_ConvoContinue3: ^(He chuckles as you site the bathroom at the end of the path-way)
knot_ConvoContinue4: ^(He nods, a small smile playing on his lips, as you site the bathroom at the end of the path-way )
knot_Bathroom: ^Oh! I need to go to the restroom.
^Yeah, sure. Go ahead - I’ll be just out here.
^(You go inside and lock yourself in a stall.)
^(You sit on top of the closed toilet seat and bounce your leg nervously. )

s: ^You walk out the stall, look into the mirror and touch up your makeup
^You sit on the toilet seat for another 5 minutes.

knot_BathroomExit: ^(You walk out the bathroom, strolling closer to a smiling Ethan. )
^Hey.. would you like to go for dinner with me?

s: ^No. I’m sorry but I should get going.

knot_Dinner: ^(You both walk out of Victoria Park as the sun disappears beneath the horizon. )
knot_Reject: ^(You pace down the same pavement from earlier, leading you to the front gates. Before exiting, you notice a couple setting up for a picnic as the fire-red sun disappears beneath the horizon. )
